Package io.github.jgame.gui

Class ProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.sprite.Sprite
      • io.github.jgame.gui.ProgressBar
  • public class ProgressBar
extends Sprite
    Useful bar for displaying progress.

    Could be useful as a Health bar too.

    Extends Sprite

    • Field Detail

      • maxVal

        public double maxVal
        The maximum value of value. The value is clamped.

      • minVal

        The minimum value of value. The value is clamped.

        The actual value of the progress bar.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProgressBar

        public ProgressBar​(double min,
                   double max,
                   double val,
                   java.awt.Dimension barSize,
                   int outlineWidth,
                   java.awt.Color insideColor,
                   java.awt.Color outsideColor,
                   java.awt.Color emptyBarColor)
        ProgressBars!
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum value for the bar
        max - Maximum value for the bar
        val - Value for the bar
        barSize - The bar size (not including the outline)
        outlineWidth - The width of the outline
        insideColor - Color of the bar
        outsideColor - Color of the outline
        emptyBarColor - Color of the bar filler (essentially a full bar rendered behind the bar)

    • Method Detail

      • updateBar

        public void updateBar()
        Update the width of the bar according to the value of the ProgressBar. The value is clamped according to minVal and maxVal

      • blit

        public void blit​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
        Draw the ProgressBar to the screen!
        Overrides:
        blit in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        screen - Graphics to blit to
